original_title: Rojava - Nordsyrien: Die Kurden zwischen Krieg und Demokratie
overview: What will happen next in northern Syria? All of the parties to the conflict - the Americans, Assadâ€™s regime, Russia, Iran and Turkey - have their own agendas for the war-torn region. But what do the Kurds themselves think about their future?
title: Rojava - Northern Syria: The Kurds Between Conflict and Democracy
